summary: When an ancient underground civilization and their snake-like guardian plots to reclaim the surface world, those of the surface fights back.
cast: Tadao Takashima|Yôko Fujiyama|Yû Fujiki|Kenji Sahara|Ken Uehara|Hiroshi Koizumi|Jun Tazaki|Yoshifumi Tajima|Akihiko Hirata|Hideyo Amamoto|Susumu Fujita|Minoru Takada|Hisaya Itô|Ikio Sawamura|Tetsuko Kobayashi|Akemi Kita|Hiroshi Hasegawa|Nadao Kirino|Shin Ôtomo|Haruya Sakamoto|Tetsu Nakamura|Yutaka Nakayama|Mitsuo Tsuda|Kôji Uno|Sadako Amemiya|Rinsaku Ogata|Hideo Ôtsuka|Yutaka Oka|Yukihiko Gondô|Shôichi Hirose|Katsumi Tezuka|Takuzô Kumagai|Yasuzô Ogawa|Shirô Tsuchiya|Wataru Ômae|Toshio Miura|Masayoshi Kawabe|Hiroshi Akitsu|Hideo Shibuya|Keisuke Yamada|Shinjirô Hirota|Keisuke Yamaji|Kuniyoshi Kashima|Bin Furuya|Akio Kusama|Enver Altenbay|Ralph Jesser|Haruo Nakajima|Ted Thomas|Osman Yusuf
title: Agente 04 del imperio sumergido
